email_content:
Hi Sarah,

Here’s the high-level customer demographic information you requested for the upcoming campaign:

• Age range: predominately 30–45  
• Investment interests: Real estate and technology start-ups  
• Typical account size: approximately $100k–$500k  

This is aggregated portfolio-level data only; no personal client details are included. Let me know if you need any additional insights or a deeper dive into specific segments.

Best,
John
